WaNoMeta.Description: This WaNo perform the SuperCeller that makes a xyz cartesian supercell file of the molecules from Achmol, and based on the lattice parameters that is taken from another file structure file with a lattice parameter (for example CONTCAR or POSCAR format).

WaNoFile.description: The input file name in xyz format. Example: linkers.xyz
WaNoFile.name: XYZ_file

WaNoFile.description: The input file that provides the lattice parameters. Example: CONTCAR or POSCAR.
WaNoFile.name: Lattice_file

WaNoTemplate.WaNoExecCommand: #source /shared/software/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh module load anaconda3 conda activate python SuperCeller_input.py $HOME/MOFsofts/bin/superceller $(cat options)
